features: Exquisite Traditional Rug - The classic rug has a gorgeous and unique color with a orange border and vintage pattern design to add luxury and warmth to your home. Placing the 4x6 rug in high traffic areas will definitely earn you a ton of 'wow' s and compliments

Durable Bedroom Rug - The surface of entryway rug is made of premium polyester, which has a soft plush feel, but non-shedding. The low pile rug can be placed flat in front of doors without interfering with opening doors or hiding dust, debris and hair, so you don't have to worry about the mess from kid or pet activity

Non-slip Rug - The living room rug backing has thousands of anti-skid rubber point, sufficient grip to prevent dangerous slides and slips, while the indoor floor carpet backing is friendly to all kinds of floor, whether wood or otherwise floor

Suits Any Room - The large area rug is the perfect addition to bedroom, living room, kitchen, dining room, office and entryway, beautifying any area of your home while creating a comfortable and romantic artistic atmosphere. And the beautiful rug is also suitable as a Christmas gift for family and friends

Machine Washable Rug - Use vacuum cleaner, broom or rag for daily cleaning, washing machine cold water machine wash and outdoor hose rinse for deep cleaning, our printed rug is more stain resistant, generally 3-6 months for a deep cleaning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose YJ.GWL Boho Vintage Rug for Bedroom? 1. The distressed area rug is made of high-quality synthetic fibers that are not only soft, but strong and durable enough to against daily wear and tear. 2. This large area rug with modern abstract design beautifully enhances any room of the home, great home decor for hallway, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, laundry room, entryway, study, or home office. 3. We promise to provide excellent pre-sales and after-sales service, you can tell us at any time if you have any questions.

How is the rug packaged? Our boho rugs are packaged in a folded format, which is due to current crating restrictions and also to save on high shipping costs due to oversizing so that customers can get our rugs at the best charge. How to make creases disappear? Maybe you can try these way: 1. Reverse roll the rug, let it sit for a day or two; 2. Flatten the rug by applying weight; 3. Apply carpet tape; 4. Place the rug outside in the sunlight for a few hours; 5. Use a clothing steamer. How to clean the rug? The area rugs are safe in the washing machine. Also for daily cleaning with vacuum cleaner, broom. Tips: Wash in cold water with mild detergent; Do not use chlorine or bleach; Tumble dry on low heat or lay to air dry. Why is there a color difference? 1. Different batches may have different colors, which is normal; 2. Due to the light and screen display, the color of the floor mat may have some chromatic aberration in different environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Rug! Colors are Beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend. I bought the 5x7 size. I only had the rug down for a couple weeks when one dog threw up on it and another peed on it. It washes beautifully, stain came out and dried quickly on extra low in the dryer! The colors are even better than the picture and the rug is not heavy. I washed it in my front load washer. This rug is also so soft! I bought a 2x6 also! It was a great value and even better price! I bought a back up rug too since I love it so much!Lastly, it vacuums well but maybe just don't try to go back and forth on rug. I have a shark vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice color but wrinkles and creases
reviews.reviewText: Love the color pattern and thinness of this rug. Not the same quality as Ruggable. But price is right. It came vacuum sealed, so there were many creases that didn't come out after laying on floor for 2 weeks. So I washed/dried it. Creases are better, might be better to wash than lay flat to dry. Picture shows immediately after washing/drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These rugs are soft and durable. I really like the colors. We use them in our motorhome and they are easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More like a colorful floor mat
reviews.reviewText: Ok it was cheap. And I wasn't expecting too much. But this is barely a rug. I think calling it a mat would be more accurate. It is very thin, and the backing is fabric with little grippy dots that don't do much to stop it sliding around on a bare floor. It looks nice from a distance, but it is maybe a quarter inch thick. And it comes folded up and there are a lot of creases. I thew it in the washing machine on a delicate cycle and in the dryer and it did relax some of the creases. I'm keeping it because my old dog needs a path on the tile floor where he doesn't slip. But it would be a little embarrassing if I were to put this as a decorative rug for humans. If you need something colorful to cover under your desk where it won't get much traffic its probably ok, but I'm not expecting it to last very long. That being said, I might buy more so the dog will be comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This rug exceeded my expectations in every way. The colors and design are lovely and the overall quality is excellent. It is still not completely flat but I've only had it for a couple of days. Truly a great rug for the price. Highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not that impressed and cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: There are several points regarding this rug that need to be made. Point one-the pattern on this rug is a printed image, while the fibers on the rug are almost flat…think printed picture on a sheet of paper. Point two-I ordered the red/blue. The color red is more orange than red. Point three-this rug is very cheaply made. I believe if I had felt the material before buying I would have realized that $50.00 was way too much to spend. It looks cheap and it feels cheaper. I know that I wasted my good money on this rug.The reason I gave it one star was that it was the length and width I needed.I do not know how long I will keep this in my sunroom before I donate this and just buy an area rug at Lowe’s or Walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has turned out to be a nice rug. No, it's not an expensive Oriental carpet, but those cost hundreds, if not more. This is thin, pretty, lays perfectly, and doesn't slip around. I'll definitely order more if I need another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for price
reviews.reviewText: I got the blue gray . It’s thin and light . Very pretty would be easy to wash . It does slip , so will have to get a rug grip pad . It’s a good product for the price
